h2_title: How to Get the Baw-Baw-Lang-Lang Spirit
content: Defeating Baw-Li-Guh-Yang will provide you with his Spirit and an item called a **Tadpole**. Unlike the other Spirits that cost Will and eventually a Knot of Voidness to upgrade, Baw-Li-Guhh-Yang requires Tadpoles. There are six frog bosses in Black Myth: Wukong, and each one yields a Tadpole when defeated.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Baw-Baw-Lang-Lang_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Baw-Baw-Lang-Lang Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'How to Get the Baw-Baw-Lang-Lang Spirit'.
The content is as follows:
Defeating Baw-Li-Guh-Yang will provide you with his Spirit and an item called a **Tadpole**. Unlike the other Spirits that cost Will and eventually a Knot of Voidness to upgrade, Baw-Li-Guhh-Yang requires Tadpoles. There are six frog bosses in Black Myth: Wukong, and each one yields a Tadpole when defeated.
